import React, { useState } from 'react' import {Form,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from 'axios' import { Row,Container} from 'reactstrap'; function DashBoard() { const [tutorialcards,setTutorialCards]=useState({ tutsimage:"", tutsname:"", tutscontent:"", tutsbuttonlinkyt:"", tutsbuttonlinkgithub:"" }) function InputEvent(event){ const {name,value}=event.target setTutorialCards((preVal)=>{ return{ ...preVal, [name]:value } }) } function TutsSubmit(event){ console.log("Form Button Click For Tuts") } return (
